GSP33bbdip12u:4: liṅgātmakānāṃ śabdānāṃ viṣṇau pravṛttiṃ darśayatyasmin pāde prādhānyena/
GSP33bbdip12u:6_1: - liṅgeti // liṅgānumāpako dharmaḥ / saḥ ātmevātmā pravṛttinimittaṃ yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:7_0: iti sudhokteḥ / svarūpārtho vā ātmaśabdaḥ / pūrvayojanāyāmātmapratipādake gauṇī vṛttiḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:7_1: dvitīyāyāṃ tu sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti bhedaḥ / svārthe kaḥ / tathā ca vyāpyadharmadvārā
GSP33bbdip12u:7_2: dharmibodhakānāmāpātato yaugikānāmityarthaḥ / viṣṇoranyatra prasiddhānāmiti ca saṃyojyam 'śabdānāmiti';
GSP33bbdip12u:10_0: prakarṣeṇa sādhayati sūtrakāra ityarthaḥ / vaiśvānarādhikaraṇe nāmasamanvayakaraṇādavyāptinirāsāya
GSP33bbdip12u:10_1: prādhānyena ityuktam / tathā ca tatrāpi nāmasamanvayamukhena prādhānyena phalato
GSP33bbdip12u:13: 'brahma tatamam'; iti sarvagatatvamuktaṃ viṣṇoḥ / tacca 'tasyaitasyāsāvādityo rasaḥ'; (ai.ā. 3-2-3.)
GSP33bbdip12u:16_0: yadyapi pūrvapādāntyadhikaraṇenaitatpādādyasya nāvāntarasaṅgatyapakṣeti na sā pradarśanīyā /
GSP33bbdip12u:16_1: tathāpi iha tasyāḥ sambhavātphalasyāvaśyavaktavyatvācca sā pradarśyata ityāśayena
GSP33bbdip12u:16_2: pūrvādhikaraṇasaṅgatiṃ viṣayādikaṃ ca darśayati brahmeti // iti vākye viṣṇoḥ nivadhikasarvagatatvamuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:17: uktamiti ca vartate / tathā ca 'brahma tatamam';
GSP33bbdip12u:18_1: tatraivaitareyake 'etaṃ hyeva bahvṛcāmahatyukte mīmāṃsanta etamagnāvadhvaryava etaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:18_2: mahāvrate chandogāḥ etamasyāmetaṃ divyetaṃ vāyāvetamākāśa etamapsu etamoṣadhīṣvetaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:18_3: vanaspatiṣvetaṃ candramasyetaṃ nakṣatreṣvetaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣvetameva brahmetyācakṣate';
GSP33bbdip12u:19_0: ityādau etamityuttaravākyena uktamityarthaḥ / tato 'pi kimityataḥ sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣamāha
GSP33bbdip12u:19_1: - tacceti // co 'vadhāraṇe / ādiśabdena 'sa yaścāyamaśarīraḥ prajñātmā yaścāsāvāditya
GSP33bbdip12u:19_2: ekametaditi vidyāt tasmāt puruṣaṃ puruṣaṃ pratyādityo bhavati ..... sūrya ātmā jagatastasthuṣaśca
GSP33bbdip12u:20_1: ca kṛtaḥ / tathā ca yatha etamityuttaravākyenoktaṃ sarvaprāṇihṛdayasthatvaṃ tasyetyādinā
GSP33bbdip12u:21_0: atastasyaiva tatpūrvoktaṃ tatamatvamapi bhavet / na viṣṇoriti yojanā / atra pūrvapakṣe
GSP33bbdip12u:21_1: tatamatvaṃ saṅkucitaṃ sarvabhūtagatatvarūpaṃ vivakṣitam / na caivaṃ siddhāntyabhimataniravadhikasarvagatatvākṣepāprāptiriti
GSP33bbdip12u:24: viṣṇoranyasyaiva sarvaprāṇigatatvamiti sayuktikapūrvapakṣaśca darśito bhavati / siddhānete śrutyarthastu - 'tasya';
GSP33bbdip12u:26_1: pradyumno rasaḥ sārabhūtaḥ / sa yaścāyaṃ puruṣadehagataḥ prākṛtadehavarjanādaśarīraḥ 'prajñātmā';
GSP33bbdip12u:27: jñānarūpo 'niruddhaḥ / yaścāsāvāditye sthitaḥ pradyumna etatsthānadvayagataṃ rūpamekamiti vidyāt / tasmātpuruṣādityagatāniruddhapradyumnayoraikyādādityaḥ 'puruṣaṃ puruṣaṃ prati';
GSP33bbdip12u:29: abhimukho bhavati / pratigṛhaṃ kūpa itivatsarvapuruṣagato bhavatīti ceti / 'jagato';
GSP33bbdip12u:34: āsamantādapūrayadityarthaḥ / etamityādīnāṃ saptamyantapadaiḥ pratyekaṃ sambandhaḥ / tathā ca 'bahvṛcāḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:45_0: sarvaprāṇiṣu antaḥ vyāptamācakṣate vidvāṃśa ityarthaḥ / sarveṣvityeva pūrteḥ punarbhūteṣvityuktiratra
GSP33bbdip12u:45_2: viṣṇuṃ guṇapūrṇatvādvyāptatvācca etaṃ mukhyato brahmetyācakṣate iti vākyaśeṣārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:45_3: na sthānādhikaraṇaṭīkāyāṃ tu - sarveṣu bhūteṣu cakṣurādisthāneṣu etamekameva brahma
GSP33bbdip12u:45_4: guṇapūrṇamācakṣate iti vyākhyātam / pūrvapakṣī tu tasyaitasya prakṛtaprasiddhasaṃvatsarasyāsau
GSP33bbdip12u:45_5: prasiddha ādityaḥ sūryo rasaḥ sārabhūto 'dhipatirityarthaṃ manyate /
GSP33bbdip12u:53: atha siddhāntayatsūtramavatārayati - ata iti // iti saṅgatisambhavādākṣepasadbhāvācca atastatparihārāyottaramabravīdbādarāyaṇa ityarthaḥ / tadeva sūtraṃ paṭhati - sarvatreti /
GSP33bbdip12u:60: ityadhyāhāraṃ cābhipretya pratijñāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - sa yaśceti // vākyeneti śeṣaḥ / yadyapi 'tasyaitasyāsau';
GSP33bbdip12u:65_0: nāpi viṣayamātrapradarśanatātparyeṇa / api tu pūrvaṃ viṣayavākyasya anudāhṛtatvāttadarthatayā
GSP33bbdip12u:69: iti vākyamapi saṅgṛhītaṃ bhavati / tena ca sūtre saṅkucitavṛttinā sarvatretyanena sarvabhūtahṛdgatatvasyaivābhipretatvenānyatra bahirneti prāptaśaṅkā nirastā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:75: hetvaṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - tadeveti // vyākhyātametajjijñāsānayer / iśvarabrahmaṇorabhedabodhanārthaṃ pravṛttasya 'paramaṃ yo mahadbrahma paramaṃ yaḥ parāyaṇam';
GSP33bbdip12u:76: iti bhāratavākyasya yaḥ paramaṃ mahadbrahma yaḥ paramaṃ parāyaṇaṃ tasya lokapradhānasya jagannāthasya nāmnāmityuttaravākyenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:80: sa hi sarvaguṇaiḥ pūrṇaḥ tadanye tūpacārataḥ // iti /
GSP33bbdip12u:83: vāsudevādityaparā smṛtiḥ / 'vāsudevāt'; kṛṣṇādanyaḥ ko vā brahmaśabdamukhyavācyo bhavet,
GSP33bbdip12u:84: na ko 'pi / kintu sa eva mukhyavācyaḥ / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip12u:87: vāsudevaḥ sarvaguṇaiḥ pūrṇastadanye tvapūrṇāḥ tasmāt / tarhi 'brahmāṇi jīvāḥ sarve 'pi';
GSP33bbdip12u:88: ityādi kathamityata āha tadanya iti // vāsudevādanye jīvāḥ 'upacārataḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:90: na tu mukhyata ityarthaḥ / itīti / vākyeṣviti śeṣaḥ / anena sarvatretyasya hetāvapyanvayo darśitaḥ / tathā ca sarvatrodāhṛtavākyeṣu 'tasminneva';
GSP33bbdip12u:93: sarvagate vastuni śravaṇādityarthaḥ / tasminnevetyanena śruterniravakāśatvamuktaṃ bhavati / anena 'sa yaścāyamaśarīraḥ prajñātmā'; (ai.ā. 3-2-3.)
GSP33bbdip12u:95: iti śākhāśeṣeṇa sarvatra sarveṣu bhūteṣu antargatatayocyamāno nārāyaṇa eva na tvādityādiḥ / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip12u:97: iti sarvabhūtagate vastuni nārāyaṇaikaniṣṭhatvena śrutyādiprasiddhabrahmaśabdopadeśācchruteriti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:105_2: draṣṭādeṣṭā ghoṣṭā vijñātā prajñātā sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmantarapuruṣaḥ sama ātmeti vidyāt'; (ai.ā. 3-2-4.)
GSP33bbdip12u:106_0: iti vākyaśeṣo gṛhyate / ityādīti luptatṛtīyavibhaktikaṃ padam / asya vivakṣiteti
GSP33bbdip12u:106_1: sūtrapadenānvayaḥ / ata eva sūtrabhāṣyayorekībhāva iti tattvapradīpoktiḥ / anena
GSP33bbdip12u:106_2: sūtre śrutyeti śeṣaḥ sūcitaḥ / caḥ pūrvoktahetusamuccaye 'vadhāraṇe ca / yato vaktuṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:106_3: yogye vivakṣā bhavati / ato vivakṣitāḥ vaktuṃ yogyāḥ vakṣyamāṇā iti vā / ye tu śrutīnāṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:107_1: iti vā / sarvatretyanuvartate / gate iti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca sarvatra gate vivakṣitānāṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:107_2: śrutyā sarvatra gataniṣṭhatayā vaktuṃ yogyānāṃ itaḥparaṃ śrutyā sarvagataniṣṭhatayā
GSP33bbdip12u:107_4: yogyatvena tasminnevopapatteḥ anyatrānupapatteśca sarvatrocyamāno nārāyaṇa eva iti
GSP33bbdip12u:107_5: sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / yaḥ prakṛto viṣṇuḥ saḥ 'ataḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:108: deśakālaguṇairvyāptaḥ / ata sātatyagamane iti dhātuvyākhyānāt 'santato hyata ucyate';
GSP33bbdip12u:109: iti vacanācca / yadvā - ato 'tistṛtīye 'tiśaye adhika ityarthaḥ / 'aśrutaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:110: sarvātmanā śrotumaśakyaḥ / svayameva svātmānaṃ svātantryeṇa śṛṇoti / 'narte tvat'; (ṛ. 10-112-9.)
GSP33bbdip12u:112: aprāptaḥ pūrṇatvātsarvātmanājñāta iti vā / sarvātmanā mananaviṣayo na bhavatītyamataḥ / anato netṛrahitaḥ svatantra iti yāvat / 'adṛṣṭaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:116: niyojakaśūnyo 'nyairanājñapta iti vā / yathānyaiḥ svayamaśrutādirna tathānye,
GSP33bbdip12u:130: sa hi 'na te viṣṇoḥ jāyamāno na jāto devaḥ'; (ṛ. 7-99-2.)
GSP33bbdip12u:133: nanvetacchrutyuktānām aśrutatvādiguṇānāṃ kuto viṣṇuniṣṭhatvamityata āha - sa hīti // hiśabdaḥ prasiddhau / 'saḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:135: ityādinā vākyenāśrutatvādiguṇaḥ tadvattayā prasiddha ityarthaḥ / śrutau 'śrotrādinā';
GSP33bbdip12u:136_0: iti padādhyāhāreṇeti bhāvaḥ / yadyapi śrutāvatatvasya prathamoktatvādatatvādiguṇa
GSP33bbdip12u:136_1: iti vaktavyam / tathāpi tasya sarvagatatvarūpatvena viṣṇuniṣṭhatayā sādhyatvāt asiddhatvāt
GSP33bbdip12u:136_2: sa viṣṇuratatvādiguṇakaḥ prasiddha iti siddhanirdeśāyogāt aśrutatvādītyuktam / yadvā
GSP33bbdip12u:137: ityādiśruteriti prayoge sarvagatatvarūpasyātatvasya sāodhyatvāttasya ca 'na te viṣṇo';
GSP33bbdip12u:141: 'sa savitā sa vāyuḥ sa indraḥ so 'śrutaḥ so 'dṛṣṭo
GSP33bbdip12u:142: yo hariryaḥ paramo yo viṣṇuryo 'nantaḥ'; ityādicaturvedaśikhāyām // 2 //
GSP33bbdip12u:145: ityādiśrutau mukhato 'śrutatvādikaṃ viṣṇorna pratīyate ityato 'traivārthe spaṣṭaśrutiṃ cāha - sa iti / yaḥ 'savitā';
GSP33bbdip12u:147: balajñānarūpo devaḥ sa paramaḥ paramātmaiva / yaḥ 'indraḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:149: na prasiddhādiḥ / yo 'śruto 'dṛṣṭaḥ so 'nanto 'parimito harireva nānya ityarthaḥ / yadvā - yo haryādiśabdavācyaḥ prasiddhaḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:150: sa eva savitṛtvādiguṇavāciśabdavācya ityarthaḥ / ityādīti / yataḥ caturvedaśikhāyāmityādyuktamato 'pi sa evāśrutatvādiguṇa ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:155_0: nanu yathā brahmaśabdādaśrutatvādiliṅgaiśca viṣṇuḥ sarvagata ityucyate / tathādityādiśabdātsarvajīvaliṅgāccādityaḥ
GSP33bbdip12u:155_1: sarvajīvā vā sarvagatāḥ kiṃ na syurityata āha - na ceti // 'ādityo rasaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:156: ityādityaśabdāt sarvagatatvaprakaraṇe 'cakṣurmayaḥ śrotramayaḥ chandomayo manomayo vāṅmaya ātmā'; (ai.ā. 3-2-1)
GSP33bbdip12u:157: iti śrutau jñānakaraṇacakṣurādyātmakadehābhimānitvena jīve prasiddhāccakṣurmayatvādeścetyarthaḥ / hetusamuccaye caśabdaḥ/ 'jīvaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:158: ityanena sūtragataṃ śārīrapadaṃ vyākhyātam / 'śārīrau tāvubhau proktau jīvaśca paramastathā';
GSP33bbdip12u:159_0: iti smṛteḥ / śarīrābhimānitvācca jīvasya śārītvaṃ yuktam / jīva ityekavacanaṃ samudāyābhiprāyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:159_1: jīvaścetyapi caśabdānvayaḥ / tenādityapratijñā samuccīyate / sarvatra gata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:167_0: kuto na vācyamityatra hetvākāṅkṣāyāṃ sūtramupanyasya pratijñābhāgasyāvatārikābhāṣyeṇaiva
GSP33bbdip12u:167_4: evetyanena sautratuśabdo vyākhyātaḥ / anupapattistu ṭīkāyāmeva sahetukamupapāditā /
GSP33bbdip12u:175: yuktyantareṇa śārīrasya sarvagatatvaṃ nirākurvatsūtramupanyasya tadupāttaśrutimevodāharati - karmeti // bhāvapradhāno 'yaṃ,
GSP33bbdip12u:177: iti padatrayaṃ vipariṇāmenānuvartate / tathā ca sarvatroktasya sarvagatasya prakṛtasya 'etamātmānaṃ parasmai śaṃsati';
GSP33bbdip12u:178_0: ityaitareyaśrutau śaṃsanakriyāyāṃ sa etamātmānamiti karmatvena śārīrasya jīvasya
GSP33bbdip12u:178_1: ca tasyāmeva kartṛtvena vyapadeśāt ekasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ tayorutsargato bhinnatvaniyamāt
GSP33bbdip12u:178_2: apavādakāraṇābhāvācca na sarvatrocyamānaḥ śārīra ityarthaḥ / tattvapradīpe tu - cakārāt 'parasmai';
GSP33bbdip12u:183: phalavidhurā bhavantītyarthaḥ / ityādītyasya pūrvavatsūtreṇānvayaḥ / ādipadena 'ātmānaṃ veda';
GSP33bbdip12u:184: iti ṭīkoktaṃ 'yastityāja sacividaṃ sakhāyaṃ na tasya vācyapi bhāgo 'sti'; (ai.ā. 3-2-4.)
GSP33bbdip12u:188: tasya 'vāci'; vedādhyayanādau tasmāt 'bhāgaḥ'; phalaṃ nāsti narakaṃ ca syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:196: yaduktaṃ brahmaśabdāt viṣṇureva sarvagata iti / tadayuktam,
GSP33bbdip12u:197_0: brahmaśabdasya jīve 'pi vṛtteḥ / na cāsau jīve 'mukhya iti tadagrahaḥ / cakṣurmayatvādibādhakabalenāmukhyārthasyāpi
GSP33bbdip12u:197_1: grahaṇopapatteḥ / na ca dvitīyasūtroktabādhakānna jīvaḥ 'śrutvāpyenaṃ veda na caiva kaścit';
GSP33bbdip12u:199: tṛtīyoktasya ca viṣṇāvapi sāmyāt / nāpi turīyoktacakṣurmayatvādibādhakena,
GSP33bbdip12u:200: ekasyaiva karmatvakartṛtvayoḥ upapatterityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya tadupāttaśrutimevodāharati - śabdeti // bhāṣyasya sūtreṇānvayaḥ / tathā ca 'etameva brahmetyācakṣate';
GSP33bbdip12u:202: sāvadhāraṇatvarūpaviśeṣavattvādityarthaḥ / asya nānena brahmaśabdena śārīra ucyate iti labdhasādhyenānvayaḥ/ anenaivakāro vidheyapadasaṅgataḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:203_0: tacchiraskabrahmaśabdaśca mukhyabrahmatvārthakaḥ / sa ca jīve na yukta ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:203_4: sāvadhāraṇatvaprāpteḥ / yadyapi na śārīra etacchabdārthaḥ / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip12u:204: tasya evakārārthapratiyogivācakabrahmaśabdenaiva viśeṣitatvāditi sūtravṛttissambhavati / tathāpi na sā ṭīkokteti na kairapi pradarśitā /
GSP33bbdip12u:209_0: sāvadhāraṇatve 'pi brahmaśabdasya kuto na jīve vṛttirityata āha - na hīti / hiśabdaḥ
GSP33bbdip12u:209_1: prasiddhau hetau ca / kavaya iti śeṣaḥ / kuta iti cet evakāraśiraskabrahmaśabdavācyatve
GSP33bbdip12u:210_1: 'pi pūrvapakṣe etacchabdārthatvena abhimatajīvādanyasya brahmatvaṃ niṣiddhaṃ syāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:210_2: tacca nopapadyate / jīvādanyasya paramātmāno mukhyabrahmaṇo jātyāderamukhyabrahmaṇaśca
GSP33bbdip12u:210_4: - jīvasya brahmatve tasya bhūtatvena bhūteṣvityuktaṃ bhūtasthatvaṃ na yujyata ityuktam /
GSP33bbdip12u:213: 'eṣa u eva brahmaiṣa u evātmaiṣa u eva savitaiṣa u evendra eṣa u
GSP33bbdip12u:214: eva harirharati paraḥ parānandaḥ'; iti cendradyumnaśākhāyām // 5 //
GSP33bbdip12u:216: viṣṇāvapi sāvadhāraṇabrahmaśabdasya vṛttiḥ kuta ityata āha - eṣa iti // u eva / yadvā - uśabdo viṣṇuparaḥ / tathā caiṣa viṣṇureva brahmetyarthaḥ / 'ātmānam';
GSP33bbdip12u:218_0: ityuktasavitṛtvādikamapi viṣṇorevetyāha - eṣa u evātmetyādinā / ya u yo viṣṇureva
GSP33bbdip12u:218_1: hariḥ / tatra nimittamāha - haratīti / yajñagṛheṣviḍopahūtaṃ bhāgaṃ svīkarotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:218_2: yadvā - satāṃ pāpaṃ haratītyarthaḥ / evameṣa eva para uttamaḥ pūrṇānandaśceti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip12u:218_3: indradyumnaśākhāyāmityasya 'ya etaṃ sarvabhūtasthaṃ viṣṇumeva brahmetyācakṣate indradyumnāḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:229_0: smṛtisamākhyayāpi viṣṇoratroktasarvagatatvaṃ sādhayatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā tāṃ smṛtimudāharati
GSP33bbdip12u:229_1: - smṛteśceti // ityādismṛteśca sarvatrocyamāno nārāyaṇa evetyanvayaḥ / na kevalamuktahetubhya
GSP33bbdip12u:229_2: iti cakārārthaḥ / smṛteḥ svavacanatve 'pi paroktānuvādarūpatvāt taduktiryuktā / evamagre
GSP33bbdip12u:230: guḍākā nidrā tadīśastadrahita iti yāvat / guḍavadāsamantātkeśā yasya saḥ ślakṣṇakeśeti vā / ahamantaryāmitayā sarvahṛdayasthita ityarthaḥ 'gāṃ';
GSP33bbdip12u:233_0: sāmarthyena dhārayāmītyanyavākyasyārthaḥ / ime ca gītāyāmarjunaṃ prati kṛṣṇavākye /
GSP33bbdip12u:233_1: pūrvavākye sarvabhūtāśayastho ya ātmā jīvaḥ so 'hamityabhedapratītinirāsāya dvitīyavākyodāharaṇam /
GSP33bbdip12u:238: anye tu 'manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīro bhārūpaḥ satyasaṅkalpaḥ'; iti vākye manomayatvādiguṇar iśvara eva,
GSP33bbdip12u:239: na jīva iti siddhāntite jīveśayoraikyāt kathametadityāśaṅkya asti bhedaḥ / na cāpasiddhāntaḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:242_0: mithyābhūta eva sūtrakṛtā vivakṣita iti samādhāya bhedamithyātve sūtratātparyaṃ varṇayanti /

GSP33bbdip12u:507: iti tattvapradīpodāhṛtaśruteḥ parabrahmāvāsatvāttadanyajīvābhimanyamānatvātparārdhaṃ śarīramiti vā / ṛtaṃ satyaṃ tathā dharmaḥ sukṛtaṃ cābhidhīyate /
GSP33bbdip12u:508: ṛtaṃ tu mānaso dharmaḥ ....... iti gītābhāṣyodāhṛtasmṛteḥ śāstravihitakarmabhirāgataṃ phalamupalakṣaṇayā ṛtamityucyate / tathā ca 'ṛtaṃ pibantau';
GSP33bbdip12u:511: devapitṛbhūtamanuṣyabrahmayajñākhyapañcamahāyajñavantaḥ / 'sa eṣa yajñaḥ pañcavidho 'gnihotraṃ darśapūrṇamāsau cāturmāsyāni paśuḥ somaḥ'; ()
GSP33bbdip12u:512_1: vā / naciketā nāma ṛṣiḥ naciketasa idaṃ nāciketamagnicayanaviśeṣaḥ / trināciketāstrivāramanuṣṭhitanāciketeṣṭakācayanavanto
GSP33bbdip12u:512_2: ye vartante viduṣāṃ pāpināṃ ca krameṇa 'chāyātapau';
GSP33bbdip12u:514_0: śrutyuktapibantāviti / iti vākye pibantau yau pratīyete tau kāvityanvayaḥ / anena
GSP33bbdip12u:514_1: pibantau kiṃ jīvaparau uta pararūpe eveti saṃśayaḥ sūcito bhavati / itītyanantaraṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:514_2: iti saṃśaye jīvasahitar iśvaraḥ pāteti pūrvapakṣe ca satīti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:523_0: atha siddhāntayatsūtramavatārya vyācaṣṭe - ucyate iti // sūtrātparata itiśabdo 'dhyāhāryaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:523_1: guhāṃ praviṣṭāviti hetugarbhaṃ viśeṣaṇam / pibantāvityātmapadavyākhyānam / ṛtamityādāvadhyāhāryam /
GSP33bbdip12u:523_2: viṣṇurūpe ityātmānāvityasya vyākhyānāntaram / tathā ca - yāvātmānau ṛtaṃ pibantau
GSP33bbdip12u:524: yato guhāṃ praviṣṭāviti yojanā / evetyanenānuvṛttatuśabdārtha uktaḥ / viṣṇū iti vaktavye viṣṇurūpe evetyuktiḥ dvivacanasya rūpadvayavivakṣayā sāvakāśatoktyarthā /
GSP33bbdip12u:530: nanu viṣṇossarvaśarīreṣvekaikarūpeṇaiva praveśātkathaṃ rūpadvayābhiprāyeṇāpi dvivacanopapattirityataḥ taddarśanāditi sūtrāṃśasūcitaśrutimudāharati - gharmeti // bhagavantāviti,
GSP33bbdip12u:531: kartumiti ca śeṣaḥ / trivṛtamityāvartate / tathā ca 'gharmā';
GSP33bbdip12u:532: gharmau dīptau gharṣakau saṅkocakāviti vā / 'gharṣaṇātsarvalokasya nṛsiṃho gharma ucyate';
GSP33bbdip12u:535: samantau vyāptau prakṛtipuruṣakālavyāpinau / deśataḥ kālataḥ śaktitaśca sampūrṇau yau bhagavantau trivṛtaṃ tejobannātmakaṃ śarīraṃ 'vyāpatuḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:544_0: sahavāyuṃ viduriti śrutyarthaḥ / gurvarthadīpikāyāṃ tu samantāditi padacchedaṃ kṛtvā
GSP33bbdip12u:544_1: vidyamānāviti cādhyāhṛtya samantādvidyamānau vyāptāviti vyākhyātam / taccintyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:546: ekaḥ suparṇaḥ sa samudramāviveśa sa idaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ vicaṣṭe /
GSP33bbdip12u:547: taṃ pākena manasāpaśyamantitastaṃ mātā relhi sa u relhi mātaram //
GSP33bbdip12u:548: suparṇaṃ viprāḥ kavayo vacobhirekaṃ santaṃ bahudhā kalpayanti / (ṛ. 10-114-4., 5.)
GSP33bbdip12u:550: suṣṭhu paramānandarūpo bhagavān samudramāviveśa / sa idaṃ sarvaṃ jagat 'vicaṣṭe';
GSP33bbdip12u:554: lihyata iva / sa paramātmā mātaraṃ relhi / tāvanyonyaṃ sambaddhau bhavataḥ / tathā ca - bhagavadvyañjakavāco 'pi taddhyaṅgyatvamiti bhāvaḥ / tameva suparṇamekaṃ santaṃ 'viprāḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:557_0: keśavādidvādaśadhā sthitaṃ kalpayanti cintayanti ityarthaḥ / taddarśanāditi / tasya
GSP33bbdip12u:557_1: viṣṇoḥ dvirūpatayā sarvaśarīrapraveśasya uktatvādityarthaḥ / tathā ca - ekasminnapi
GSP33bbdip12u:557_2: viṣṇau yuktaṃ rūpadvayābhiprāyeṇa dvivacanamiti bhāvaḥ / evaṃ taddarśanāt ityetat
GSP33bbdip12u:557_3: tattvapradīparītyā uktaviśeṣaṇe nirṇīte viṣṇau dvivacanadarśanāt 'ekaḥ suparṇaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:558: ityādinā tacchabdenaikavacanena parāmarśadarśanāt tasyaiva samudraniveśino nikhilabhuvanadarśinaḥ 'apaśyamantitaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:563: niviṣṭo hṛdaye nityaṃ rasaṃ pibati karmajam //
GSP33bbdip12u:566: nanu viṣṇau rūpadvayavivakṣayā pratyayārthopapattāvapi prātipadikārthakarmaphalabhoktṛtvāyogāt na 'ṛtam';
GSP33bbdip12u:567: iti vākyapratipādyatvaṃ tasyetyata āha - ātmeti // eka eva hariḥ dehajīvarūpopādhibhedāt ātmāntarātmeti rūpabhedena 'dvidhā sthito';
GSP33bbdip12u:568: dvidhā bhūtaḥ / dehajīvayorhṛdaye niviṣṭaḥ / yaddhā - ṭīkārītyā upādhibhedavivakṣāmantareṇaiva dvirūpatayā dehaniviṣṭaḥ 'karmajaṃ rasaṃ';
GSP33bbdip12u:571: bhuṅkte ityarthaḥ / smṛta iti pāṭhe kīrtitaḥ ityarthaḥ / rasaśabdena jīvābhogyaguṇabhoktaiveśvaraḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:572_0: na tu tadbhogyadravyabhokteti prameyaṃ sūcitam / bṛhatsaṃhitāyāmityasya taddarśanādityanuvṛttavākyenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:572_1: karmaphalabhogasyoktatvāditi tadarthaḥ / tathā ca - na tadanupapattiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:573: śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇameva ca /
GSP33bbdip12u:578: śubhaṃ pibatyasau nityaṃ nāśubhaṃ sa hariḥ pibet /
GSP33bbdip12u:579: pūrṇānandamayasyāsya ceṣṭā na jñāyate kvacit // iti pādme //
GSP33bbdip12u:591_0: iti śruteḥ / pibatīti ṛtapānakartari advitīyatvamabhyupaiti / anenārthena dvitīyapakṣamaṅgīkṛtya
GSP33bbdip12u:591_1: ādyapakṣo 'nabhyupagamena parihṛtaḥ / pūrṇānandasya sukhabhogāyoga iti dvitīyaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:592: iti gītābhāṣyokteḥ / tathā ca - pūrṇānandarūpasyāsya viṣṇoḥ 'ceṣṭā';
GSP33bbdip12u:593: aiśvaryaṃ kvacitkāle deśe kenāpi sākalyena 'na jñāyate';
GSP33bbdip12u:594: na cintyate ityarthaḥ / tathā ca - aiśvaryabalena pūrṇānandasyāpi sukhabhogo yukta iti bhāvaḥ / yadvā - viṣṇorbhoktṛtvābhyupagame 'anaśnannanyaḥ'; (mu. 3-1-1.)
GSP33bbdip12u:595_0: iti śrutivirodha ityata āha - śubhamiti // parādhīnabhogābhāvaviṣayam aśubhabhogābhāvaviṣayaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:595_1: vā tadvākyamiti bhāvaḥ / na ca 'nīcoccataiva duḥkhāderbhoga ityabhidhīyate / nāsau
GSP33bbdip12u:596_0: sukhabhogasyoccatārūpatvāditi vācyam / viṣṇau jīvasamavete bhoge svīkārāmātrābhyupagamena
GSP33bbdip12u:596_1: uccatāsampādakavikriyāviśeṣānabhyupagamāt / uktaṃ hi tattvapradīpe - na ca 'anaśnannanyaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:597: iti śrutivirodhaḥ / na hi parādhīnatayā bhogo,
GSP33bbdip12u:599: kintu - jīvasamavete bhoge svīkāramātramucyata iti / yadvā - nīcoccatāsampādako bhogaḥ svīyatayā sākṣātkāraḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:601: na cāsāvīśvare iti na virodhaḥ / pādma ityanantaraṃ uktatvāditi śeṣaḥ / tathā ca - na śrutiyuktivirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:604: yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyām (tai. 2-1.) ityādinā prasiddhaṃ hiśabdena darśayati // 11 //
GSP33bbdip12u:607: tasya jīve 'pi yogādityata āha - yo vedeti / viṣṇoreva guhānihitatvamatra grāhyamiti copaskartavyam / ādiśabdena 'ātmāntarātmā';
GSP33bbdip12u:610_0: ityādismṛtirgṛhyate / tathā ca ityādinā viṣṇoreva prasiddhaṃ guhānihitatvamatra grāhyamiti
GSP33bbdip12u:610_1: imamarthaṃ sūtrakāro hiśabdena darśayatītyarthaḥ / tathā ca - hṛdayaguhāsthatvamātrasya
GSP33bbdip12u:610_2: jīve sambhave 'pi na tadiha hetutvena gṛhyate / kintu - śrutyādiprasiddhaṃ mokṣajanakajñānaprakārībhūtaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:610_3: prādhānyena guhānihitatvameva / tacca jīve niravakāśamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:615_0: hi yasmāttau hṛdayaguhāṃ praviṣṭau tasmāt / na hi jīve 'pi guhāniviṣṭatvaliṅgaṃ sambhavatīti
GSP33bbdip12u:615_1: vācyam / tasya śrutyādyaprasiddhatvāt / tatra prasiddhasyaiva grāhyatvāt / viṣṇostu 'yo veda';
GSP33bbdip12u:616_0: iti śrutyādyaprasiddhatvāditi hiśabdārthaḥ / nanu viṣṇau pibantāviti dvivacanānapapattiḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:616_1: na ca rūpapraveśena dvirūpeṇa praveśasyāsiddhatvādityāśaṅkyāha - taddarśanāditi /
GSP33bbdip12u:617_0: iti śrutyuktatvāditi sūtrārthaḥ / atra tattvityasyānuvṛtyā śrautapadānuvṛttyā ca
GSP33bbdip12u:617_2: gatimāha - ātmeti // smṛtisamākhyāṃ śrautapadānuvṛttiṃ vinā ādeyaṃ mātīti vyutpattyā
GSP33bbdip12u:617_3: śubhakarmaphalabhoktṛtvarūpaliṅgaṃ ca vaktum / uktaṃ hi candrikāyām - ādeyaṃ mātīti
GSP33bbdip12u:617_6: tathā - yadyapi samanvetavyamṛtapātṛtvaṃ sākṣādeva vaktavyamiti tadvākyāntarasyāpyādeyaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:617_7: mātīti vyutpattimantareṇāntaryāmītivat ṛtaṃ pibantāviti spaṣṭaśabdenaiva vaktavyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:617_8: na tvātmaśabdenetyarthāśrayaṇānna virodhaḥ / anyathā uktavākyavirodhāpātāt / evaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:618_0: tathā teṣāmeva samanvayasūtrāttadityatrāpyanuvartate iti candrikāvirodhoktirapi cintyā /
GSP33bbdip12u:618_3: ivātrānuvṛttyaucityāt / na ca tadityanuktau tuśabdasyānvayaḥ pratyetuṃ śakyate iti
GSP33bbdip12u:626_1: prakṛtyarthabhoktṛtvasambhavācca sa eva pāteti siddhyati / kimu punarniravakāśaśrutyāpītyarthaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:626_3: viśeṣaṇādityanvayaḥ / sūtre pibatoriti vipariṇāmenānuvartate / co yuktisamuccaye /
GSP33bbdip12u:627: iti śrutau pibatorekavacanabodhyenaikatvena viśeṣaṇādeka eva pātā / sa ca yajamānasetutvabrahmatvākṣaratvādinā viśeṣaṇāt brahmaṇaśca paratvena viśeṣaṇādviṣṇureva,
GSP33bbdip12u:628: na jīva iti sūtrārthaḥ / na kevalaṃ liṅgāt,
GSP33bbdip12u:633: taṃ dhyātuṃ naciketasaṃ prati sādhanaṃ vaktuṃ 'śakemahi'; śaktāssma iti kāṭhakaśrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:639: amitā hi guṇā yasmānnānyeṣāṃ tamṛte prabhum / iti brāhme /
GSP33bbdip12u:641: brahmaśabdasya bhagavadekavācitvaṃ smārayati - pṛthagiti // atra yata ityāvartate / tathā ca yataḥ 'tasya';
GSP33bbdip12u:644: vivicya vaktuṃ na śakyante / jñātavyāśca sarvairadhikāribhiḥ sarve guṇā iti śeṣaḥ / yato brahmaśabdena sarveṣāṃ guṇānāṃ 'grahaṇaṃ';
GSP33bbdip12u:645_0: jñānaṃ bhavet ataḥ sarvaguṇajñānārthaṃ tasmin viṣṇau brahmaśabdaḥ prayujyate iti
GSP33bbdip12u:645_1: śeṣaḥ / yato brahmaśabdena sarveṣāṃ guṇānāṃ grahaṇaṃ bhavet / evaṃ ca sarvaguṇavācī
GSP33bbdip12u:646: tatra vṛttimantareṇa tajjñānajanakatvāyogāditi bhāvaḥ / yasmādvibhuṃ taṃ viṣṇumṛte anyeṣāṃ jīvānāṃ nāmitā guṇāḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:649: mukhyavācako nānyeṣāmityarthaḥ / brāhma ityanantaraṃ brahmaśabdasya bhagavadekavācitvamuktamiti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:654: atra paraiḥ pibantau buddhijīvāviti pūrvapakṣe prāpte jīveśvarāveveti vyākhyātaṃ,
GSP33bbdip12u:655: tannirākaroti - na ceti// atreti śeṣaḥ / asminnadhyāye iti tadarthaḥ / hetau,
GSP33bbdip12u:656: svavyānena saha paravyākhyānanirākaraṇasya samuccaye vā caśabdaḥ tathā cāsaṅgatiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:659: satya ātmā satyo jīvaḥ satyaṃ bhidā satyaṃ bhidā
GSP33bbdip12u:660: satyaṃ bhidā maivāruvaṇyo maivāruvaṇyo maivāruvaṇyaḥ // iti paiṅgiśrutiḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:662: nanu nātra jīve samanvayakathanamasaṅgatam / jīveśvarabhedasyāsatyatvena tayoraikyāt / jīvasamanvayasyaiva brahmasamanvayarūpatvādityata āha - satya iti / 'satyaṃ';
GSP33bbdip12u:664: bhedaḥ / yadyapyatrātmajīvayoḥ satyatvavacanenaiva tatsvarūpabhedasyāpi satyatvamuktaṃ bhavati / tathāpi punaḥ 'satyaṃ bhidā';
GSP33bbdip12u:667_0: āsamantādaraśīlā vā āravaḥ tairasatyabhedajñānibhiḥ viṣṇuḥ sarvathā vanyo bhajanīyo
GSP33bbdip12u:667_1: netyarthaḥ / iti paiṅgiśrutirityanantaraṃ yata iti śeṣaḥ / asya nāsatyo bheda ityuttareṇānvayaḥ
GSP33bbdip12u:667_2: evaṃ bhāllaveyaśrutirityasyāpi / atra yadyapi bhāgavatatātparye - 'satyatvaṃ ca bhedasyoktaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:667_3: bhāllaveyaśrutau / sthāṇurheccakrāma sa prajāpatimuvāca ko 'si ke smaḥ kaḥ saḥ iti /
GSP33bbdip12u:667_4: sahovāca yo 'smi ye stha yaḥ sa iti / athainamupākrośat satyaṃ bhidā satyaṃ bhidā satyaṃ bhidā';
GSP33bbdip12u:669: iti vākyaṃ bhāllaveyaśrutyantargatatayā paṭhyate / bhāṣyapustake 'pi kvacit 'satyam';
GSP33bbdip12u:671: iti vākyaṃ ca bhāllaveyaśrutitvenaiva paṭhyate / na tu śrutidvayasthatvena / tathāpi anayostātparyānusāreṇaikaśrutisthatvaṃ,
GSP33bbdip12u:674: iti bhāllaveyaśrutiḥ / tātparyodāhṛtā tu anyā tatsamākhyā rūpā cetyadoṣaḥ / 'sthāṇuḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:682: kīdṛśaḥ / kiṃ bhinna utābhinna ityāśayaḥ / krameṇottaramāha - ahaṃ 'yo';
GSP33bbdip12u:685: viṣṇuryādṛśo mayā bhavadādibhiśca bhinnastādṛśa eveti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:688: 'ātmā hi paramassvatantro 'dhiguṇo jīvo 'lpaśaktirasvatantro 'varaḥ'; iti ca bhāllaveyaśrutiḥ / (12)
GSP33bbdip12u:690: evameva hi me vācaṃ satyāṃ kartumihārhasi //
GSP33bbdip12u:700: pūrṇaśaktiḥ / ata evottaratra paramatvasvatantratvapūrṇaśaktitvaviruddhānāṃ dharmāṇām alpaśaktirityādipadairyutkrameṇābhidhānaṃ kṛtam /
GSP33bbdip12u:702: atraivārthe purāṇavākye paṭhati - yatheti // atra ṣaṣṭhyantaṃ vākyaṃ pādmasthaṃ,
GSP33bbdip12u:705: evārtho 'yaṃ śabdaḥ / satyabhedāviti bahuvrīhiḥ / yathā satyabhedau tathaiva vidyamānānatikrameṇa jñātena 'satyena';
GSP33bbdip12u:706: satyabhedena bhedasatyatvajñānākhyakāraṇeneti yāvat / sahakeśavā ityekaṃ padaṃ,
GSP33bbdip12u:707: keśavasahitā devāḥ 'trāyantu'; asmān rakṣantvityarthaḥ / ityādervākyānnāsatyo bhedaḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:708: kintu - satya eveti jñāyata ityarthaḥ / atra pūrvavākye jīveśabhedasya dṛṣṭāntatvenopādānātprāmāṇikatvaṃ jñāyate,
GSP33bbdip12u:709_0: tādṛśasyaiva dṛṣṭāntatvāt / dvitīye tu viṣayānatikrameṇa bhedasatyatvajñānasya trāṇakāraṇatvoktyā
GSP33bbdip12u:709_1: bheda satyatvamapi jñāyata iti prakṛtasaṅgatiḥ / ādipadena grāhyavacanāni tattvapradīpe
GSP33bbdip12u:709_2: udāhṛtāni / tathāhi - dvau bhūtasargau loke 'smin daiva āsura eva ca /
GSP33bbdip12u:710: daivo vistaraśaḥ proktaḥ āsuraṃ pārtha me śṛṇu //
GSP33bbdip12u:716: ta āsurāḥ svayaṃ naṣṭāḥ jagataḥ kṣayakāriṇaḥ // iti vyāsasmṛtiḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:717: indrāsomā tapataṃ rakṣa ujjataṃ nyarpayataṃ vṛṣaṇā tamovṛdhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:722: svājñānakalpitajagatparameśvarasya jīvasya bhedakaluṣīkṛtabhūmabhāve / iti hi māyino vadanti /
GSP33bbdip12u:725: triryātudhānaḥ prasitiṃ tayetvṛtaṃ yo agne anṛtena hanti / (ṛ. 10-87-11.)
GSP33bbdip12u:726: vācā stenaṃ śarava ṛcchantu marman viśvasyaitu prasitiṃ yātudhānaḥ / (ṛ. 10-87-15.)
GSP33bbdip12u:727: atha jñānopasargāḥ ityārabhya yecānye mithyātarkairdṛṣṭāntaiḥ kuhakendrajālairvaidikeṣu paristhātumicchanti taiḥ saha na saṃvaset / prakāśyāhyete taskarā asvargyāḥ (maitrī. 7-8.)
GSP33bbdip12u:728: ityādiśrutiśatairandhaṃ tama eva māyināṃ gatiriti niścīyate / tathā ca skānde -
GSP33bbdip12u:731: sarve yānti tamo ghoraṃ na teṣāṃ utthitiḥ kvacit // iti //
GSP33bbdip12u:740: atrādhikaraṇe cakṣurantaḥsthatvaliṅgaṃ brahmaṇi samanvīyate / śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayavākyaṃ viṣayasaṃśayau sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ ca darśayati - āditya iti // 'yaścāsāvāditye';
GSP33bbdip12u:742: ityantarnayodāhṛtāyāṃ ca śrutāvānandamayo 'ntasstho viṣṇurāditye 'stītyuktamityarthaḥ / tataḥ kimityata āha - ya iti / tadityādau saṃyojyam / 'so 'haṃ sa evāham';
GSP33bbdip12u:743_1: 'nuśaśāsa / ya eṣa candramasi puruṣo dṛśyate / so 'hamasmi sa evāhamasmi / athainamāhavanīyo
GSP33bbdip12u:743_2: 'nuśaśāsa / ya eṣa vidyuti puruṣo dṛśyate so 'hamasmi sa evāhamasmīti ca vākyadvaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:743_4: na prakṛtopayuktam / tathā agnīnāmiti bahuvacanaṃ cānupayuktam,

GSP33bbdip12u:946: paraṃ brahmeti vyākhyātam / tathāpi tadbrahmaśabdasya parāparayo rūḍhyā vṛttyā vyākhyānāntaramityadoṣaḥ/
GSP33bbdip12u:952_0: nanu upakrame pūrṇasukhasaṃvidorabhidhāne 'pi kuto 'sya prakaraṇasya vaiṣṇavatvamityāśaṅkya
GSP33bbdip12u:952_1: tayosatallakṣaṇatvāt tadrūpatvāt upakrame tadabhidhāne brahmaivopakrāntaṃ syāditi
GSP33bbdip12u:952_2: bhāvena pūrṇasukhajñānayorbrahmalakṣaṇatvaṃ śrutyā darśayati - vijñānamiti // vijñānādirūpaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:953: saṅkoce kāraṇābhāvāditi prakṛtasaṅgatiḥ / idaṃ vājasaneye śrutam / 'ānando brahma';
GSP33bbdip12u:954: iti / taittirīyavākyāditi śeṣaḥ / ādiśabdena 'athaiṣa eva parama ānandaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:959: svalakṣaṇaṃ jñāyata ityarthaḥ / tathā ca - śrutyantare brahmalakṣaṇatvenāvagatayoḥ pūrṇajñānasukhayoratra prakaraṇe 'bhidhānāt asya vaiṣṇavatvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:966_0: niravadhikapūrṇānanda eva lakṣaṇam / iha lakṣaṇatvenābhipretaḥ na pūrṇānandamātram /
GSP33bbdip12u:966_1: sa ca viṣṇoreva nānyeṣām / anyeṣāṃ tvāpekṣikameva pūrṇaṃ sukhaṃ na viṣṇuvanniravadhikaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:966_2: pūrṇamityarthaḥ / kuta ityata āha - yataḥ avyaktādīti / avyaktā śrīḥ saivādiryeṣāṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:966_3: te tathoktāḥ / tṛṇajīvā manuṣyottamā evānte viśeṣārthaḥ / 'vipruḍānandabhāginaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:967: tāratamyena brahmānandapratibimbatvāpekṣikānandayuktā ityarthaḥ / cetanā iti śeṣaḥ / 'na saṃśayaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:974_0: nanvagyādisukhasyāpekṣikatayāpi pūrṇatvasadbhāvātteṣāṃ pūrṇasukhamidaṃ kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:974_1: tathā teṣāṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ na syāt / tathā teṣāmevedaṃ prakaraṇaṃ kiṃ na syāt ityata
GSP33bbdip12u:985: nanvetadupakrame sukhajñānayorabhidhāne 'pi nākṣisthaprakaraṇasya vaiṣṇavatvaṃ yuktam / chāndogye 'prāṇo brahma kam';
GSP33bbdip12u:987: iti vidyāṃ coktvāgnibhirupakosalaṃ prati 'upakosalaiṣā somya te 'smadvidhā cātmavidyā coktā';
GSP33bbdip12u:992: ityakṣisthavidyāyā ādityavidyayaikārthatvāt / na copakramavirodhaḥ / yathā 'hvayāmyagniṃ prathamaṃ svastaye';
GSP33bbdip12u:997: ityagnerasmacchabdenoktatvādagnīnāmevedaṃ prakaraṇaṃ na viṣṇoḥ / na ca 'asmadvidyā';
GSP33bbdip12u:999_1: pariharatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā tadupāttaśrutimevodāharati - śruteti // itītasya sūtreṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1000: matadhyātetyapi draṣṭavyam / keti vāyurucyate / 'ko vāyuriti śabditaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:1001: iti abhidhānāt / kaśabdasyāvṛttyā gatirityanenāpi sambandhe kagatiriti parabrahmagatirucyate / 'kaṃ brahma';
GSP33bbdip12u:1002: iti vākyabodhitaparabrahmaprakaraṇādetadarthaniścayāt / tathā ca - śrutopaniṣadāṃ śrutamatadhyātaitadvidyānāṃ puṃsāṃ kena vāyunā kagateḥ 'kaṃ brahma';
GSP33bbdip12u:1005: na tvagniviṣayeti sūtrārthaḥ / yadvā - śrutopaniṣadamupakosalaṃ pratyagnibhiretadvidyāphalatvena brahmagatyabhidhānādvaiṣṇavamevedaṃ prakaraṇaṃ,
GSP33bbdip12u:1006: natvagniviṣayamityarthaḥ / tattvapradīpe tu - 'sa enān brahma gamayati';
GSP33bbdip12u:1007_0: iti śrutopaniṣatkānāṃ śrutopaniṣadgatopāsanānāṃ brahmagatyabhidhānācca āntaro viṣṇureva /
GSP33bbdip12u:1007_1: asyāmupaniṣīdati brahmetyupaniṣat upāsanā / anayā brahma upaniṣīdatīti vetyuktam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1007_2: śrutaviṣayiṇī yā upaniṣat matidhyānarūpopāsanā tatkānāṃ tadgataṃ tadviṣayakaṃ dhyānarūpopāsanaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:1007_4: bahuvrīhisamāsāvayavabhūtaḥ kaśabda āvṛtto brahmavācaka ityuktaṃ bhavati / ata evāha
GSP33bbdip12u:1007_6: - upaniṣacchabda upāsanāparaḥ / ṭīkākṛtpakṣe vidyāparaḥ / ṭīkāyāṃ vāśabdaścārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1007_8: paramasādhye yuktyantarapratipādakatvābhāvādatra caśabdo na prayojyaḥ / tathāpi 'sa enān brahma';
GSP33bbdip12u:1008_5: 'atha yadu caivāsmiñchavyaṃ kurvanti yadi canārciṣamevābhisambhavanti / arciṣoharanha
GSP33bbdip12u:1008_6: āpūryamāṇapakṣaṃ āpūryamāṇapakṣādyān ṣaḍudaṅṅeti māsānstānmāsebhyaḥ saṃvatsaraṃ saṃvatsarādādityamāditiyāccandramasaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:1008_7: candramaso vidyutaṃ tatpuruṣo mānavaḥ sa enān brahma gamayati';
GSP33bbdip12u:1014: arcirnāmakadevalokaṃ sambhavanti prāpnuvantyeveme jñānina iti vipariṇāmenānvayaḥ / saṃviśatītyekavacanāntaviśidhātupāṭhaḥ 'te';
GSP33bbdip12u:1017: tataḥ sūryo 'yān'; ṣaṇmāsān udaṅṅeti tanmāsadevalokam uttarāyaṇalokaṃ ca,
GSP33bbdip12u:1023: svamāptān pratīkālambanān caturmukhākhyaṃ kāryaṃ brahmāpratīkālambanāṃstu paraṃ brahma gamayatīti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1029: tathāpi kuto nāgniviṣayatvamasyā ityata āha - na hīti // 'hi';
GSP33bbdip12u:1030_0: yasmādanyasyāgnervidyayānyagatiranyasya brahmaṇaḥ prāptirna yuktā / yasmāccātra parabrahmaprāptiḥ
GSP33bbdip12u:1030_1: phalatvenocyate ityarthaḥ / tasmānnānyavidyeyaṃ brahmavidyaiveti vākyaśeṣaḥ / hiśabdena
GSP33bbdip12u:1030_2: vipakṣe - 'devān devayajo yānti madbhaktā yānti māmapi';
GSP33bbdip12u:1032: iti vacanavirodhastu tayorantaryāmisarvagatarūpadvayaviṣayakatvena pariharaṇīyaḥ / sāvakāśaśruterapi niravakāśaśruteḥ prābalyāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1040: evamupapattyādibhirviṣṇorakṣisthatvaṃ pratipādya vipakṣe bādhakenāpi tatsamarthayatsūtraṃ paṭhati - anavasthiteriti / atrāntarastattajjīvaprerakatayā tattaccakṣussthitaḥ 'itaraḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:1042: yataḥ sa itaro jīva iti hetusādhyayojanāmabhipretya atra vipakṣe 'niṣṭaprasaṅgābhidhāyakatayānavasthiterityaṃśaṃ yojayati - jīvasyeti / 'sāmyāt';
GSP33bbdip12u:1044_0: idaṃ ca tattvapradīparītyā dehalīdīpanyāyenobhayatra sambadhyate / jīvasya jīvāntaraniyāmakatve
GSP33bbdip12u:1044_1: ityetadvipariṇatamasambhavādityanenāpi sambadhyate / co hetusamuccaye / itara ityasyāgnirityarthe
GSP33bbdip12u:1044_2: vācye jīva iti sāmānyenoktiḥ sādhyahetvostantreṇābhidhānārtham / na jīva ityasya
GSP33bbdip12u:1045: yataḥ sa itaro jīvaḥ jīvatvāditi yāvat / na ca vipakṣe bādhakābhāvaḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:1046_0: jīvasya jīvāntaraniyāmakatve prerakatve āntarajīvasyāpi jīvatvasāmyatāttasyāpi niyāmakaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:1046_2: abhyupagamya cedamuditam / vastutastu - jīvasya jīvāntaraniyāmakatvāsambhavācca netaro
GSP33bbdip12u:1047: agnerjīvasya preryajīvāntareṇa saha paratantrarūpajīvatvasāmyāditi sūtravṛttirdarśitā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:1053_0: nanu jīvaprerakāgneḥ svātantryābhyupagamānnānavasthā / na caivaṃ jīvāntarasyāpi svātantryaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:1053_1: syāt jīvatvasāmyādityuktamiti vācyam / jīvatvasāmye 'pyagnereva svātantryaṃ nānyeṣāmiti
GSP33bbdip12u:1053_2: niyamābhyupagamādityata āha - niyameti // jīvatvasāmyepyagnereva svātantryaṃ nānyeṣāmiti
GSP33bbdip12u:1054: tathāpi tatprerakasyeśvarasya svātantryasambhavānnānavasthetyata āha - anīśvaretir / iśvaraṃ jagatprerakatvena yo 'pekṣate 'bhyupaiti sar iśvarāpekṣaḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:1056_0: tasya bhāvastattvaṃ tasmādityarthaḥ / pūrvavādina iti śeṣaḥ / hetusamuccaye caśabdaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1056_1: evaṃ vā - nanu paratantratvasāmye 'pi jīvānāṃ jīvāntaraniyāmakatvātkathaṃ tadasambhava
GSP33bbdip12u:1056_2: ityata āha - anīśvareti / vyākhyānaṃ pūrvavat / tathā ca - yathāsmatpakṣe sati rājñi
GSP33bbdip12u:1056_3: maṇḍaleśe prajānāṃ rājaśaktyā niyamyaniyāmakabhāvavart iśvaraśaktyā jīvānāṃ jīvāntaraniyāmakatvasambhavaḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:1058_0: pareṇar iśvarānabhyupagamāditi bhāvaḥ / idaṃ ca vākyadvayasya yojanādvayam / ṭīkāyāṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:1064: 'yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan pṛthivyā antaro yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yasya
GSP33bbdip12u:1065: pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīmantaro yamayatyeṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:1068_1: viṣayavākyodāharaṇapūrvakaṃ viṣayaṃ darśayati - ya iti // ityādīti prathamā saptamyarthe /
GSP33bbdip12u:1074: ityādikamādiśabdena gṛhyate / antaryāmītyanena viṣayo darśitaḥ / bṛhadāraṇyake uddālakaṃ prati yājñyavalkyenoktaṃ idaṃ vākyam / 'yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ';
GSP33bbdip12u:1075: pṛthuṃ viṣṇumūḍhvā vāti gacchatīti pṛthivī garuḍaḥ tasmin tiṣṭhan 'pṛthivyāḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:1078: tadabhimānī cetano na veda sākalyena / 'yasya ca pṛthivī';
GSP33bbdip12u:1079: tadvaśatvanimittāt śarīrabhūtā / na kevalaṃ tatra sthitimātraṃ,
GSP33bbdip12u:1080: kintu 'yo 'ntaraḥ'; antaḥsthitvā bāhyaviṣayāpekṣāṃ vinā ramamāṇaḥ / svato nityatṛptaḥ -
GSP33bbdip12u:1091: nitya iti śrutyarthaḥ / etena antaro vivikta iti ṭīkāyā bṛhadbhāṣyavirodho nirastaḥ / bṛhadbhāṣyasya 'ya ātmānam';
GSP33bbdip12u:1092: ityatrasthāntaraśabdaviṣayatvāt / ata eva na śrutau paunaruktyam / dvayorbhinnārthatvāt / pūrvapakṣī tvidaṃ vākyamanyaparaṃ manyate /
GSP33bbdip12u:1096: sa ca 'yasya pṛthivī śarīram'; ityādinā sarvātmakatvāt prakṛtistattajjīvo vā yuktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1098: pūrvādhikaraṇatadviṣayavākyasaṅgatiṃ darśayati - tatreti // iyamatra tattvapradīpoktā yojanā - 'yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan';
GSP33bbdip12u:1101_0: ityanena ucyate iti / anena bṛhadāraṇyakoktāntaryāmiṇi viṣṇvanyatvākṣepamukhena taduktāmṛtatvasyāpyanyaniṣṭhatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:1101_2: saṅgatiruktā bhavati / tataḥ kimityataḥ sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣayati - sa ceti / caśabdo
GSP33bbdip12u:1102_0: ityādeḥ saṅgrahaḥ / tacchabdasya vipariṇāmena hetuvākyena sambandhaḥ / ātmaśabdaḥ
GSP33bbdip12u:1102_1: svarūpaśarīrobhayārthaḥ / tathā ca so 'ntaryāmī jaḍacetanobhayarūpā prakṛtiḥ pṛthivyāditattajjīvo vā yuktaḥ / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip12u:1108: nanu yathā prakṛtyādiliṅgena teṣāmantaryāmitvaṃ tathā amṛtatvaliṅgena viṣṇostatkiṃ na syādityata āha - na hīti // pṛthivyādi śarīraṃ yasya sa tathoktaḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:1109_0: tasya bhāvastattvaṃ tvapratyayāpāṭhe tvanvayaḥ ṛjuḥ / aṅgīkriyate / siddhāntineti
GSP33bbdip12u:1109_1: śeṣaḥ / tasya pṛthivyādijaḍabhinnaciccharīratvāditi hiśabdābhiprāyaḥ / tathā ca -
GSP33bbdip12u:1116: 'yaṃ pṛthivī na veda, yaḥ pṛthivyā antaraḥ'; (bṛ. 5-7-3.) ityādinā
GSP33bbdip12u:1119: siddhāntayatsūtramavatārya vyācaṣṭe - ata iti // ityādinā vākyena iti śeṣaḥ / tatra yadyapi sautravyapadeśapadena abhipretaṃ 'yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yaḥ pṛthivīmantaro yamayati';
GSP33bbdip12u:1122_0: iti vākyam / atrātyantaraśabdasya viviktārthatvena taduktārthasyāhetutvāt / tathā
GSP33bbdip12u:1122_1: ca tadudāharaṇaṃ na prakṛtopayuktam / tathāpi tatpratīkatvenodāhṛtamityadoṣaḥ / ādiśabdena
GSP33bbdip12u:1122_2: prakaraṇatrayavākyaṃ gṛhyate / adhidaivādiṣu / prakaraṇeṣviti śeṣaḥ / prakaraṇaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:1125_0: ityadhyātmaprakaraṇam / sūtre bhāṣye cādhidaivetyuktyā pṛthivyādīnāṃ jaḍatvena tadaviditatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:1125_1: sarvasyāpi sambhavatīti śaṅkā vāritā / atroktānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ adhidaivatvena cetanatvāt 'prāṇe';
GSP33bbdip12u:1127: saiva prameyadīparītyā prāṇendriyadevatā / adhidaivādiṣvityanekaprakaraṇagrahaṇena na kevalamekatra taddharmoktiḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:1128_0: kintu - bahuṣu sthaleṣviti sūcitam / anuvṛttasya tattvityasyārthamāha - viṣṇureveti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1131: tasya viṣṇoḥ dharmasya aviditatvāntaratvādeḥ 'yaṃ pṛthivī na veda';
GSP33bbdip12u:1135: sa hi 'na te viṣṇo jāyamāno na jātaḥ'; (ṛ. 7-99-2.)
GSP33bbdip12u:1139: aviditatvādeḥ kuto viṣṇudharmatvamityata āha - sa hīti // 'saḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:1141: vākyeneti śeṣaḥ / ādipadena 'divyo deva eko nārāyaṇaḥ'; (subāla. 7.)
GSP33bbdip12u:1142: ityupakramya 'yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīmantaraḥ sañcaran yaṃ pṛthivī na veda eṣa sarvabhūtāntarātmā apahatapāpmā divyo deva eko nārāyaṇaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:1145: antassthitvā ramaṇakṛtprasiddha iti śeṣaḥ / ca samuccaye / 'na te';
GSP33bbdip12u:1146: iti vākyaṃ ca te devamahimnaḥ paramantaṃ mahimānaṃ śrotrādinā nāpa iti prakṛtānuguṇyena sarvatrādhikaraṇe vyākhyātam / 'saḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:1155_0: evaṃ niravakāśaliṅgena viṣṇorantaryāmitvaṃ samarthya yaduktaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇā prakṛtyāderantaryāmitvaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:1155_1: tatprakṛtijīvasādhāraṇaṃ yuktyā nirākurvatsūtramupanyasyati - na ceti // atra 'ataddharmābhilāpāt';
GSP33bbdip12u:1157: itivadavyayībhāvasamāsarūpam / ata eva avyayamityāśayenāniyamābhiprāyeṇādau hetuvākyaṃ vyākhyāti - triguṇatvādīti / sattvādirūpāstrayo guṇā yasya kāryabhūtāstattriguṇaṃ,
GSP33bbdip12u:1160_0: triguṇatvādayaścate pradhānadharmāśca te jaḍatvasaṃsāritvādīnāṃ grahaṇam / pradhānapadaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:1160_2: pūrvapakṣe yuktisūcanāya ca prayuktaṃ smārtamityedvyācaṣṭe - smṛtyuktamiti / pṛthivyādyātmakatayā
GSP33bbdip12u:1160_6: darśayati - antaryāmīti / antaryāmī na pradhānamiti yojanā / na pradhānamantaryāmītyanena
GSP33bbdip12u:1160_7: sautracaśabdaḥ antaryāmī viṣṇureva na tu pradhānamiti tuśabdārthaḥ / sa ca na śārīra
GSP33bbdip12u:1162: svapakṣavidhirapīti parapakṣaniṣedhasya svapakṣavidhipūrvakatvarūpaviśeṣārtha iti sūcitaṃ bhavati / anenāntaryāmī viṣṇureva,
GSP33bbdip12u:1163: na tu smārtaṃ pṛthivyādyātmakatayā smṛtau pratipāditaṃ pradhānam / śārīro jīvaḥ / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip12u:1171: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhannātmano 'ntaro yamātmāna veda yasyātmā śarīraṃ ya ātmānamantaro yamayatyeṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:1173: 'yo vijñāne tiṣṭhan vijñānādantaro yaṃ vijñānaṃ na veda yasya vijñānaṃ śarīram'; (bṛ. 5-7-22.)
GSP33bbdip12u:1176_1: nirākurvatsūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - śārīra iti // ityabhidhīyate ityanvayaḥ / ubhaye
GSP33bbdip12u:1176_2: ityasya viśeṣyapadaṃ darśayati - śākhina iti / kāṇvā mādhyandināścetyarthaḥ / ātmano
GSP33bbdip12u:1176_3: 'ntara iti mādhyandināḥ vijñānādantara iti kāṇvāḥ / apiśabdaḥ śākhāsamuccaye / antaryāmiṇaḥ
GSP33bbdip12u:1176_4: iti vipariṇatamatrānuvartate / enamityanūdyajīvamiti vyākhyātam / ato na śārīraścāntaryāmīti
GSP33bbdip12u:1176_5: śeṣaḥ / tena sautracaśabdo nañaḥ samākarṣakaḥ / na kevalaṃ na smārtaṃ,
GSP33bbdip12u:1177: kintu śārīraśceti samuccaye 'pītyuktaṃ bhavati / tattvapradīpe tu - citprakṛterapyatra pūrvapakṣaviṣayatāmāśritya śrībhūdurgārūpāyāḥ tasyāḥ 'yastejasi tiṣṭhan'; (bṛ. 5-7-14.)
GSP33bbdip12u:1179: ityādyantaryāmiṇaḥ sakāśādbhedenādhyayanānna sāpyantaryāmīti samuccayārthaścaśabda ityuktam / anena 'hi';
GSP33bbdip12u:1184: śarīrābhimānī jīva iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / śrutau 'yaḥ pṛthivyāḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:1188_0: iti śrutisamākhyānājjīvasāmānyaparaḥ / yadyapi bṛhadbhāṣye ātmādiśabdasya caturmukhākhyajīvaparatayā
GSP33bbdip12u:1188_1: vyākhyātatvādidaṃ sūtraṃ jīvaviśeṣasya yogino 'ntaryāmitvanirāsakamiti / ata eva
GSP33bbdip12u:1188_2: tattvapradīpe yogino 'ntaryāmitvaṃ nirākarotītyuktam / tathāpi yadā sarvajīvābhimānicaturmukhādapi
GSP33bbdip12u:1188_3: tanniyāmakatvādinā bhinno 'ntaryāmī tadā kimu tadabhimanyamānasarvajīvāditi kaimutyadyotanāya
GSP33bbdip12u:1192: ramate ca parohyasmin śarīraṃ tasya tajjagat /
